pr_title: Added types to lists in opensearch source

timeline.message: Added types to lists in opensearch source

timeline.bodyText: I feel like I'm missing something here... If BoundingBoxUtils.getBoundingBoxCoordinatesList(bbox) returns a List<List<Double>>, then shouldn't coordinates be a List<List<List<Double>>>?
timeline.author: mojogitoverhere

replies.bodyText: That seems right, i might have messed that up.  This is why the lists should be typed in the first place.
replies.author: bdeining
